explanation: [0-0] On a green lawn, against a backdrop of a row of trees and a small hill in the upper left corner, stands a long-haired girl in a white top and red plaid skirt. The long-haired girl lifts her right hand to her face, while a short-haired girl in a white top and red plaid skirt behind her clenches her left fist and extends it to the side. Above them are two cartoon images: on the left, an angry woman with a line of Japanese text below, and on the right, a shark facing left with its mouth open and a line of Japanese text below. The bottom of the screen has a pink background with Japanese text.

[0-7] First, the long-haired girl walks to the left, maintaining her gesture, while the short-haired girl walks to the left, waving her hands. Then, a yellow-haired girl in a white top and red plaid skirt walks to the left, pumping her fists, followed by a boy in a beige vest and black trousers, swinging his arms as he walks to the left. Japanese text appears on the left side and changes three times.
